text: My child has been a student since playgroup, and he loves the spacious compound. The teachers are kind and staff are helpful. The school always strives to do better, we appreciate the effort they always put in for the kids. We like that the curriculum incorporates worship/praise & Bible stories.
This is very good school. The teacher and staffs are very good and kind. My daughter is studying there since N1 now she is in k2. She enjoys going to school everyday. My best regards to the school.

Holistic preschool education with good values.
Christian Childcare Preschool Kindergarten.
